# Slim.js ## Slim.js is a front-end Framework inspired by the famous Slim Framework v2 ![MIT](https://img.shields.io/github/license/mashape/apistatus.svg?maxAge=2592000) ![JS](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-JS-yellow.svg) [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/rbarros/slim.js.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/rbarros/slim.js) [![Code Climate](https://codeclimate.com/github/rbarros/slim.js/badges/gpa.svg)](https://codeclimate.com/github/rbarros/slim.js) [![Test Coverage](https://codeclimate.com/github/rbarros/slim.js/badges/coverage.svg)](https://codeclimate.com/github/rbarros/slim.js/coverage) Slim is a PHP micro-framework that helps you quickly write simple yet powerful web applications and APIs. ## Installation Download the latest release [here](https://github.com/rbarros/slim.js/archive/master.zip) and use the files within `dist` folder. Bower:
`$ bower install rbarros/slim.js`
Download the [production version][min] or the [development version][max]. [min]: https://raw.github.com/rbarros/slim.js/master/dist/slim.min.js [max]: https://raw.github.com/rbarros/slim.js/master/src/Slim.js ## Use ```js (function (window) { 'use strict'; var $app = new Slim(); /** * Create route hello/:name * @param {string} name * @return {void} */ $app.get('/hello/:name', function(name) { /** * Retrieve options config/.json * @type {Object} */ $app.options = options; $app.render('views/hello.twig', { name: name, logo: $app.options.logo }); }); $app.run(); }(this)); ``` ## Release History * **v1.0.2** - 2016-12-13 - Add all hooks slim. * **v1.0.1** - 2016-12-05 - Add hook.render.before ad hook.render.after. * **v1.0.0** - 2016-09-29 - Refactored code * **v0.1.14** - 2016-09-26 - Alter name classes. * **v0.1.13** - 2016-09-24 - Fix image license README - Update README * **v0.1.12** - 2016-09-20 - Update tests and add Debug. * **v0.1.11** - 2016-09-16 - Compile slim.js - Fix bug twig not found view - Add class Debug. - Fix bug localhost:8080 - Fix bug example app * **v0.1.10** - 2016-08-09 - Add origin in config.json * **v0.1.9** - 2016-07-12 - Update version 0.1.9 - Added parameters in route extension * **v0.1.8** - 2016-07-12 - Changed ownership of tag - Added extensions to slim.js and namespaces for the routes. * **v0.1.7** - 2016-07-11 - Update dist slim.js - Submit changes to send request or apply. * **v0.1.6** - 2016-07-11 - Add hash current form when the action is empty. * **v0.1.5** - 2016-07-05 - Add example and minify. * **v0.1.4** - 2016-06-09 - Update dist version 0.1.4 - Update version 0.1.4 - Fix bug input _METHOD form. * **v0.1.3** - 2016-06-09 - Fix bug put submit and add example. - Fix bug $.fn.button. - Add Promise and tests. - Alter view test - Refactor. - Add tests. - Add url tests. * **v0.1.2** - 2016-05-16 - Build and fix example - Add README.md * **v0.1.1** - 2016-05-13 - Code Refactoring - Add codeclimate - Fix bug instance redirect - Fix bug check onhashchange - Add initial test. - Fix baseurl app example. * **v0.1.0** - 2016-05-06 -
